featured.text: We all fantasize about being able to fly and lift buildings off the ground.
We fantasize about what it will be like when we reach the long-awaited goal.

definition.zh_def: 幻想，想像不真實的情景或事件。
definition.en_def: To imagine or think about something that is not real or likely to happen.
definition.example: She likes to fantasize about traveling to distant planets.
